data.name: Volatica. The Devil's Trap
data.detailed_description:
Volatica. The Devil's Trap ‚Äì is a hand-drawn rogue-like with RPG elements and an original turn-based combat system

Is a contract with the Devil always a bad idea?
The heroine of the Volatica. The Devil's Trap, bound by a contract with the Devil. She's on an endless journey through a fairy-tale world. Haunted by the Inquisition and blackmailed by the Devil, she balances between light and darkness, trying to enlist the support of powerful allies and break the never-ending cycle of rebirth.



Combat Alchemy
The magical journey is full of dangers! As the game progresses, the witch collects recipes for unique potions and gathers ingredients to make her magic even more powerful. Each recipe has its own unique effect. A spell book, a magic cauldron and a talking cat help the witch to understand how to make potions and defeat opponents.



Visual style
We pride ourselves on the visual style of the game. While creating the world, we were inspired by fantasy worlds, folklore, myths and legends. All the main elements were drawn with ink on paper and digitized. The heroes of the Volatica. The Devil's Trap universe are a wide variety of creatures, from the heroes of the fairy tales of the Brothers Grimm to the characters of ancient myths



Random events and story quests
We want players to feel the impact of the decisions made in story quests throughout the game. Despite one true ending, the fate of the Volaticaside heroes remains in the hands of the player
